game.beginning: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the land is threatened by an ancient evil known as the Shadow.
game.ending: After defeating the source of darkness, the hero must make a choice that will determine the fate of the world, bringing about either a new era of peace or a catastrophic war.
game.synopsis: The game follows the journey of a young protagonist who possesses a rare gift - the ability to wield both magic and technology. As they explore the world, they uncover a hidden conspiracy threatening global destruction. Gathering allies and mastering their unique abilities, the hero embarks on a perilous quest to vanquish the darkness, confront the shadows within themselves, and decide the fate of humanity.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
